div.ab: This is good when a man cuts himself and the blood cannot stop: Take a powder that is called "lapis mastis" in the vernacular and white vayaroch(?) and bloodstone and tree oil(?) or rose oil and mix it all together and afterwards take white (lit. clear) from an egg and put the powder in it, as I have mostly(?) said(???), and after that take a press(???) and make a little plaster(?) with it and lay it on the wound, and hold a finger on it, so will the blood stop, and it is true and tested.

This is good for dysentery and for pressure(?): Take an herb that is called valdiga(?), and mint salodica(?) and mix it all together and boil it with a piece of sonzi(???) and cook it in there very fully, and lay it on the stomach. So will he heal, and the blood(?) will leave from him, certainly.
